name: Summon Shade
description: Summon a shade version of yourself to attack an enemy and fight at your side for 15 seconds.   The shade slashes at an enemy, dealing 400 Magic Damage once every 2 seconds. The shade's attacks inflict Minor Maim, reducing the enemy's damage done by 5% for 4 seconds.
coefDescription: Summon a shade version of yourself to attack an enemy and fight at your side for 15 seconds.   The shade slashes at an enemy, dealing $1 Magic Damage once every 2 seconds. The shade's attacks inflict Minor Maim, reducing the enemy's damage done by 5% for 4 seconds.
rawDescription:
